text:
March
Twenty-first
19 4 0
Mr. M. 3. Novik
Radio Station WYNC
Municipal Broadcasting System
New York City
Dear Novik;
I see the Federal Communications Commission
has granted the State of Minnesota its
petition to intervene In the hearing on the
application of WNYC for modification of
their license to change hours of operation
from daytime to specified hours. What do
you know about this and is the information
worth having along?
Cordially,
FES/rep
Frank E. Sohooley
